Package com.fr.funrungame.view.Screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controllers
    Class that handles all the user inputs from the keyboard or the touch screen.
    CountdownScreen
    Class that does a countdown of 3 seconds before the game run starts.
    FinishMenu
    Class that handles the menu when the player finishes the race.
    GameView
    A view representing the game screen.
    HudMenu
    Hud menu used on the game run to show the current time of the run.
    LoadingScreen
    Class that loads the last best play of the current map from the server.
    MainMenu
    Main menu of the game.
    MapSelect
    Menu where the maps are selected.
    MenuScreen
    Class that handles the background and title for the MainMenu and MapSelect.
    OptionsMenu
    Class that handles the background and title for the PauseMenu and FinishMenu.
    PauseMenu
    Classe that pauses the current game.
